question: Find therapies that target EGFR for variants that cause resistance in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('EGFR')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('EGFR'))
MATCH (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('TUBA1B')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TUBA1B'))
MATCH (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  AND (

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FLT4'))
MATCH (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastrointestinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stromal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('KDR'))
MATCH (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
